name: Five Nights at Sonic's Reimagined
description:
(Story)

You've been hired to work the night shift at Sega Inc.
At first, things are normal. But then, the company's scrapped mascots start to come alive and you must protect yourself until 6 A.M from the terrors that they bring. If they get you, it's game over.

Credits:

Music Box Powerout/ending Remix by Dizcrybe (troysson81) https://www.youtube.com/user/troysson81
